name: CMS8 (AR)
beforeHooks: php artisan db:backup-restore backup --tables=hosts || true && php artisan migrate:fresh --seed && php artisan db:seed --class=ImportDataSeeder && php artisan db:backup-restore restore --tables=hosts || true && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear

name: CMS8 (ES)
beforeHooks: php artisan db:backup-restore backup --tables=hosts --tables=licenses || true && php artisan migrate:fresh --seed && php artisan db:seed --class=ImportDataSeeder && php artisan db:backup-restore restore --tables=hosts --tables=licenses || true && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear
